A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TFA was quite mediocre in terms of story but had good characters and set up TLJ very good. TLJ completely butchered the ending of TFA\, Luke Skywalker a long the new characters. There are moments in this movie that feels like a parody of the core of Star Wars. \n\nI'm completely gutted by this movie and not looking forward to episode nine at all.
